availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis M. Mason (Oldham County, Kentucky, laborer, miller, and soldier)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, laborer, miller, and soldier. Virginia native. Son of Robert Mason and Frances Mason. Married to Susan Mason. Laborer in Oldham County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Oldham County in 1860. Miller in Oldham County in 1863. Served in the Oldham County State Guard (U.S.A.) from September 17, 1862 to October 31, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Division 1, p. 139A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 827.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoun, p. 206B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Oldham County, KY, July 1863, p. 436.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 15443.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), p. 856.
"Francis M. Mason (1831-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial 113122285, accessed March 30, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/113122285.
